title: EduMadad — AI Student Loan Assistance
description: AI-powered platform to guide students through loan applications by providing personalized loan options, eligibility checks, and repayment planning using NLP and ML models.

title: Toqsy — AI Conversation Starter(building..)
description: AI assistant that helps users start and sustain real conversations by suggesting context-aware openers and follow-ups. Currently under development with LLMs and fine-tuned prompts.
